  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ContactController
    Controller class for managing contact interactions within the application.
    Current_Session_Controller
    Manages current session activities, including tracking and displaying user activity.
    Home_Controller
    Manages Home page including navigation throughout the application.
    LoginController
    Manages Login page activities, signing in to an account using persistent data and navigation to the home page
    MainController
    Manages Registration activities, sending users data to the db for persistency and navigation to the login view.
    Recommendations_controller
    Manages Recommendation session activities, including presenting data and providing detailed insights and suggestions surrounding users screen time data.
    Settings_Controller
    Controller for managing application settings.
    Timers_Controller
    Manages Timers session activities, including enabling notifications and setting timers for how long a user should be active on a screen .
